welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hailsham, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its quaint streets, picturesque landscapes, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that Hailsham has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our lovely town.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation services and offers a more personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of facilities for passengers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a small selection of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building for passengers to use.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and efficient terminal serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a wide range of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal for London Ashford International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
